title: Hextech chests
body:
Hi i just finished my game with Taric, got S grade and didn't get any chest

Is there a limit in getting hextech chests in a season?

Thank you for answer, and excuse me for my poor english

replies.body: Aye, you can only receive one chest per champion per season.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you also need to own the champion.   One more requirement is that you need to have an available chest slot for the week, which will refresh once a week.  Meaning if you already got a handful of chests, you could be out of slots.  Let me know if you have any questions!
thanks for help, it was realy an issue with weekly slots for chest
